attributes.action: Require all MPs to be solely British Citizens
attributes.background: I think that MPs only loyalty should be with the United Kingdom. I think that if MPs have dual nationality or are citizens of the Republic of Ireland or a commonwealth country, there could be a conflict of interest between loyalty to the United Kingdom and loyalty to another country.
